svt_axi_port_monitor_def_toggle_cov_callback Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_axi_port_monitor_def_toggle_cov_callback:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Toggle coverage is a signal level coverage. Toggle coverage provides baseline information that a system is connected properly, and that higher level coverage or compliance failures are not simply the result of connectivity issues. Toggle coverage answers the question: Did a bit change from a value of 0 to 1 and back from 1 to 0? This type of coverage does not indicate that every value of a multi-bit vector was seen but measures that all the individual bits of a multi-bit vector did toggle. This Coverage Callback class consists covergroup definition and declaration.
